content.detailedDescription:
1. 2.& 4.) while waiting for a bus, i looked up into the clear blue sky with very minimal clouds and i noticed a small, oval cloud-like object at first still, then started heading south, but moving slowly.  it made a 90 degree turn to its left and then continued southward again, then made a 90 degree turn to its right, and continued on its original southward path.  it did not drift, simply made a short adjustment at a clear 90 degree angle, twice.  there were no contrails with this cloud-like object, and there were no planes around (heard or seen).  this object made no noise.

3.) at first, i thought it was an oval-shaped cloud.  the oval object had feathering edges that seemed like a natural cloud, yet as it moved, it appeared to look more clearly oval, yet remained in the white color of a cloud but more clearly defined without feathered edges.

5. & 6.) this is the first time i have experienced a possible ufo.  i was very excited.  sorry i did not have a camera.  during this brief approximate half-minute, my bus pulled up, blocking my view.  sadly, i got on the bus.  it was approximately 10:41am eastern time on september 20, 2013 in new york city, in the borough of staten island.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Cloud-like ufo observed approximately 2 miles east and 5+ miles altitude.

content.detailedDescription:
Came out from grocery store and heard what sounded like a jet engine whine...  it was after dark out so couldn't see any shape but it was really big, over the store and really low.  i just stood there and watched as it passed over the store and then turned/rotated in place and moved away.  i looked around at the other people but nobody except for the bagger from safeway seemed to even notice.  it wasn't moving fast, very slow and i couldn't see how it could move that slow and still be in the air.  i got in my car, rolled down the window and could still hear the whiney sound.  backed out and could still see something dark moving in the sky but it turned and moved away off to the north.

didn't say a thing to anyone till about a week ago and when i did, my friend said his friend john saw it too but he hadn't believed him until i said i saw something.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Heard a whine, like a jet engine when taxiing, dark out but something moved

content.detailedDescription: It happened about a year ago. i'm not sure of the exact date but i do remember the sky was completely overcast and the clouds were hanging extremely low that evening. the time had to be in between 12am and 3am. i was outside smoking a cig and looking up into the sky which i do often. i was close to finishing the cig and i turned to my right heading back to the house while glancing up and there up in the clouds i saw a  sphere glowing in the  clouds. it was as if it was spying on me and once i caught it in my vision it was a split second of a pause and then it was gone just like that. the overcast clouds were not disturb whatsoever when it disappeared so what ever it was there was no propulsion. it looked as if it was  radiating energy because when i saw it you could see the solid core and the glow that was coming off of it which the clouds magnified the glow that was coming off it. the best way to describe the color would be orange but i would also add that it looked like the color from the movie pulp fiction when they opened the briefcase. the size of it looked to be the size of basketball but it was definitely bigger than a basketball. it happened so fast that i was siting there asking myself did that just really happen did i really just see that but i know what i saw even if it was just a split second. i now find myself looking up in the sky hoping to see it again but no such luck.
content.summary: It was a quick glance and it was gone.

content.detailedDescription: 2 ufo spheres appeared out of nowhere right over my house.. they looked like glowing lights. they were apart from each other by approximately 15-20 ft. they were about 50ft high. as they went over my house the 1 sphere ascended up in the sky to the point where it was out of view
content.summary: 2 ufo spheres appeared out of nowhere right over my house.. they looked like glowing lights. they were apart from each other by approximately 15-20 ft

content.detailedDescription:
Three glowing orbs as orange as fire moving in a straight line. when the last two were directly overhead, they hovered. this was similar to watching a jellyfish in water. within this brief span of time, the middle orb appeared to shift out of focus, almost like an object loses focus in a camera viewfinder. as this continued, it took on the shape of a transparent, orange octagon. not long after they ascended one by one before disappearing. cloud cover was zero. 

my father was witness to this. he had actually seen a similar display around march of 2013 in the same area. upon seeing this event, he confirmed that the orbs were the same as he had witnessed. it should be noted that my father is a licensed pilot and an air traffic controller with 25 years of experience. he was at a loss for what he saw, ruling out flares, parachutes, helicopters, drones and toy rockets.
content.summary: Three in formation. hovered, changed shape then ascended.

content.detailedDescription:
After finishing a soccer game i was standing in a well lit parking lot with other witnesses when i observed three bright redish orange light rise above the eastern horizon.  these horizon is a ridge of mountains.  the lights once able the hoizon formed a distinct triangle pattern.  the pattern did not shift and continued on an path toward the west approzimately 30 - 45 degrees max above the horizon.  a fourth light of the same color and brilliance followed behind the triangle.  what appeared to be aircraft appeared to be flying well above and behind the objects.  the object made no sound.  after approximately three to four minuted each of the triangle lights and the trailing light began to extinguish seperately until there was nothing detectable.

both myself and another observer asked if the other new what this might be.  we both responded no.  the area taken up by the objects and their coordinated movement seemed to give us the feeling it was quite large.  for me the size and perceived distance from me were shocking.  when i first saw the object my fiirst thought was that i had aligned my observation position in lign with cell tower aircraft lights located on the ridge.  as the lights continued to rise above the horizon i relaized that i had no historical reference for what i was seeing.
content.summary: A set of brilliant lights rose in the eastern sky progressed toward west had one trailing orb.  appeared enormous in size.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home and my father called me to look outside. i had recently been investigating some strange activity near my house over the past week, so i ran outside to see. i had no idea what they were, and still don't.

there were probably 6-10 i saw in total, seemingly appearing, moving from one point to another in straight lines, and then disappearing.

this being my third sighting in the sky, i wasn't afraid like before. i was elated, actually, and excited at what i was seeing. 

soon they all disappeared, there numbers dwindling down.
content.summary: Multiple orange lights moving in the east and southeastern horizon

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i were driving down the ocean road towards my beach house when we saw a large triangle snapped craft formed out of three lights over the power lines hovering over the ocean. we pulled over and watched it for a couple of minutes before the lights suddenly turned off. we then continued driving down the road and didn't see it again.
content.summary: Triangle shaped craft observed for about 5 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Was driving north on northern blvd in cicero when i noticed a very bright orange like light off in the northern direction....Was unlike any airplane light i have ever seen and was moving very slow.  upon pulling into my driveway i noticed the light was moving in a south direction but very slow.  suddenly after watching the light for about 2 min, the light went out and i could see a dark object move over the area, no lights at all...There were some commercial planes flying extremely high... this object had to be below 500 feet.  it was extremely odd that the lights went out in the object and it continued to fly especially seeing how there is a large airport in our area and the safety of the planes in the area, which is what made me feel like this was not something that we had in the air....Planes do not fly at night without lights on them.
content.summary: Bright orange light in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on my back porch, it faces west without obstruction to low level sight. i was watching the approaching sunset that was about 45 min. away. i always notice the flight traffic in my area as bham intl. airport is south of me. 
i noticed what i at first thought was a jetliner, but once i tuned in on it i saw it was not a jet. it seemed to be more like a arrowhead that was gold in color perhaps because of the sunset. it had what appeared to be exhaust of perhaps a flame, it wasnt the normal trails you would see from a jetliner of any kind. my interest was on high and i went into my kitchen that is right with my porch to get my binoculars, i was only gone seconds but the object was gone. i searched the sky for several minutes but never saw it again. the exhaust seemed solid and close to the rear of the ufo, this is what really caught my interest.
content.summary: Saw ufo as bright outlined object with a short brighter exhaust. observed only for a moment, went to get binoculars and it was gone. gone for less than 20 seconds. i live by bellingham intl. airport and iknow this was no jet or plane.

content.detailedDescription: My friend captured a photo of a space ship
content.summary: What appears to be a space craft in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was driving into work over the ben franklin bridge when i first noticed the object too the north. as i got off the bridge onto i-95 north. the object was still there to the north east over new jersey. i wanted to pull over but traffic was flying so i got off the allagheny ave. exit. i pulled over got out of my truck and noticed the object was moving in a southeast direction.  i called my buddy that i knew was not far behind me. as i was calling him he pulled up next me. he got out . we both wee just standing there watching this bright white cigar shaped object  very slowly floating. my buddy got really nervous!  we both took several pictures with our phones. we watched the object for about 10 minutes until it was out of sight.Then we went to work. i seen this object a couple times in the same location a couple times over the years. but today felt compelled to pull over and call my buddy and to take pics. i'm a foreman for a construction company. a buddy of mine who works on a different construstion crew saw the same exact object about 1 month about in the same general location. he also has pics. he also has been pron to many ufo sights with pics including a black triangle during a thunderstrom. the photos my buddy and i took are much more clear on my phone then my ipad which i am sending them from. look at the light pole in the pics it's close to that.
content.summary: Glowing cigar shaped object just calmily flotting. not the first time saw this 2 other witnesses

content.detailedDescription:
- flight "spicejet" no. 013 from bombay to dubai

 - departure 19:45 +5.5 gmt/ 18:15 +4 gmt

 - object sighted at approximately 20:45 +5.5 gmt

 - duration of sighting approximately 1 hour 30 minutes

 - object encountered over arabian sea

 - object disappeared from view when aircraft turned left at coast of fujairah

 - sighting confirmed by member of cabin crew

 - first such sighting in 45 years of air travel

 - object appeared to be a glowing fireball and quite obviously larger than stars

 - object distance appeared much closer than stars

 - object appeared to have erratic movements:

   moved in a straight line, stopped abruptly, hovered and changed path with ease and speed

   circled aircraft

   maintained speed of aircraft

   easily overtook aircraft and came back alongside

 - object randomly flashed light rapidly

 - no adverse physical or psychological effects felt during or after sighting
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireball/foo-fighter like ufo sighting over arabian sea - 15/09/2013

content.detailedDescription: We were on the shore of two jack lake in banff national park on a perfectly clear night, looking at the stars. one 'star' then suddenly doubled in brightness. my husband saw it right away, and i saw it peripherally. but i immediately looked at the spot. we thought it might be the lights on a jet airliner, but almost immediately discounted that idea as we watched what it did next. it dimmed immediately, then about four seconds later, it brighted again, then dimmed, then repeated one last time. then it vanished, not even the star-like point of light remaining. it was about 50 degrees off the horizon, far above the mountains in we think the north east. it was definitely not a radio tower, as it was too far up in the sky. a jet airliner flew by a few minutes later, and we could compare the blinking of its lights to what we just saw, and it was definetly not a plane. as the light was stationary in the middle of the sky, and there was no further blinking at any other point, we were certain it wasn't a helicopter. we are just curious if there is some explanation.
content.summary: A star-like point of light doubled in brightness three times, about four second interval, then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside my house looking at the moon and planes flying by i noticed a craft without blinking navigation lights like all the other planes in the air in my view. what caught my eye first was the lack if navigation lites but on further observation i noticed 4 lights with a white-green glow on the end of the craft facing east as the craft flew to the west. i called out to my wife who came by my side as i pointed out the lights to her , the craft continued on its path west and upwards until we could no longer see it. very exciting to see another unknown craft. i look into the nite sky a lot after seeing my first craft nearly  40 years ago!!
content.summary: Observed flying craft without flashing nav lites but what looked like landing lights pointing east as craft flew west

content.detailedDescription:
1. in our front yard, my 17 year old was sitting on our porch and called us all out to see lights in the sky.
2. 9:35 pm  
3. did not know.
4. bright orange pulsating orbs came in twos "shooting up" from the western horizon traveling east, and then arced over in a southern line making a turn then disappearing ("blinked out"). one last one came by itself and it was twice the size and of a brighter red intensity than all of the others.
5. amazed (and a little frightened)at what we were seeing, as none of us had ever seen anything like this before.
6. they just blinked out.
content.summary: Strange lights in the sky, riverside, ca, 9/17/13

content.detailedDescription: I was outside smoking a cigarette when i noticed a voilet light moving across the clouds from west to northwest. this happened for about 4 minutes. the beam was the same as a spot light but the light was not coming from the ground. the light seemed to be coming from above the clouds above my neighbors house. i didn't see anyone with a flashlight or any type of light pointing at the sky.  i called my son to see if he noticed anything unusual about the sky and he immediately that the light was coming from above the clouds.
content.summary: Voilet light beam scanning clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out to my car and as i approached my vehicle i began to feel very uncomfortable. i felt as though there was something near by watching me. i looked around and saw a human-like figure about 4ft tall standing motionless about three yards from the driver's side. it was somewhat transparent but i could easily make out its form. it had a small body with a large head with a distinct cleft running front to back on the top of its head. it didn't move as i approached it. i then got in my car and drove away.

i've had many other encounters with creatures like this and beings of other sorts.
content.summary: Direct contact with non-human entities

content.detailedDescription: We heard dogs barking so my husband and i went outside.   we saw white lights i'm the trees.  these lights were pulsating and ascending very slowly in a strange formation and looked to be flashing at each other. next we saw what looked to be one of our own stealth jets.  it was beige with no lights but two jets firing from the back.  the craft was triangular.  we heard  sonic boom. it seemed the jet went straight into the star like orbs. last we saw a rotating craft in the trees. it was projecting many colors and moved in all directions.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: First we saw star like orbs, then a rotating craft projecting many color lights, and a triangular beige air craft with jets and sonic boom.  it went straight for the star like orbs.

content.detailedDescription: After i recently first discovered entity's a few months ago, i started going outside again at night when the dogs bark.  i was just sitting on my front porch when i saw this slow moving triangular craft with many bright lights. it moved silently and slowly above my front yard.
content.summary: I was watching the sky from my from my front porch.  i saw a triangular shape aircraft moving very slow across my yard.

content.detailedDescription: i work for cherryfield foods night shift for work on blueberry barrens in columbia, maine.  nearly every night we would observe an object low on the horizon, very bright make unbelievable moves. on one occasion we witnessed five of the objects perform a scattering of maneuvers.  we have seen it go one direction slowly and then speed off and return to its original position. it normally takes place at about 9:30 to 3 in the morning. it is normally orange in color but has blue and red lights that seem to be spinning as it moves.  i saw it again last night at 10 pm.  i would guess that the object is between 10 to 14 miles away.  it has gone over head of us but was really high at the time.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orange lights making impossible manuevers through august and september

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 1:45 myself and my cousin were having a final cigarette before bed. he was facing east toward his front door i followed a minute or so behind him when i noticed the steady white to red pulsing light. since the light lookedlike an aircraft signal like the one amile or so from my position, i nearly missed the initial shock of what i was about to see. my cousin was facing away from the light as i was facing towards the light, and my cousin. gesturing to to him for a lighter panamime i noticed that the light had a steady two tempo pulse; white.Red.White.Redx2 bright.. white..Bright white.. like morse code. no sound, very close, there should have heard some kind of sound, especially considering the fact that a helicoptern past by louder and was vastly further that the light was. this whole time it seemed to be shaking almost vibrating, i also thought that i had observed it moving toward us, at which point it engorged itself directly at us with a steady to painfully brilliant light. then a second time it close succession. all the while it changes course and begins to circle us roughly 3- miles away in a semi circle path headed south southwest.And decending and pulling away in hasty fasion like it spotted that we spotted it and the intense flair of light was like a hard cold aknowledgment that we had been made. 3 times it flared during decent and all three times its brightness made me squint. finally running out of view i made the first email to aleta, an investigator i had shared with before. this all takes place within about 5 minutes and followed soon after by a thick low rolling fog system. i couldnt get to my phone fast enough, and 3 videos were the result over a 2 hour time frame
i the end i am still unable to digest what we saw, and finally before i was done investegating i see it. i cant even begin to put a description into text.
a stopsign height, humanoid torso shaped grey mass gliding from the street to the field roughly 100 yds from me. but no legs or decernable features other than a blobby mass resemling a dome on shoulders and arms in a slow motion jogging pattern gliding over curb,bush. did not getfootage
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.shape: Circle,   Fireball,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Other
content.summary: Outside smoking, observed pulsing brilliant white to red fiery orb

content.detailedDescription: My cousin and i were on the beach late at night talking endlessly, catching up because we don't get to see each other very often.  the night was beautiful and clear with a line of clouds hanging low over the ocean past cape cod and we saw many shooting stars and planes as the night wore on.  around 3:15am, we noticed a solid orange light moving across the sky from the west.  we were facing the water so it passed over us from west to east.  it seemed to be moving slightly slower than a plane and was in our view for roughly five minutes until we lost sight of it in the clouds on the horizon.  my cousin was afraid.  she thought it was an asteroid because it seemed like its flight path was descending slightly as if it were going to land out on provincetown or further out in the atlantic.  i never thought it was a meteor or asteroid because it wasn't moving that fast and it didn't have any kind of a tail and it was orange but did not look to be on fire.  as it passed above us, i saw four or five random flashes of light in the proximity of the object.  my first thought was camera flashes.  it was as if someone was up in the sky taking flash photos down towards the earth but the flashes never came from the same spot.  they were about an inch of sky view away from the orb and in different directions.  they were randomly timed also.  the first flash happened then maybe five seconds later another one happened in a different spot and then maybe two seconds later another one happened in another spot, etc.  the flashes are the hardest part for me to come up with an explanation for.
content.summary: Orange orb with linear path and separate random flashing white lights in its vicinity

content.detailedDescription: As i often do, i went out to observe the night sky. tonight was the harvest moon. i faced the southeast and saw a bright star like object that appeared to be flashing different colored lights. i went in and got my binoculars and observed the object. it appeared to have a bright white center, with bright red, blue and greenish-blue lights flashing around the white center. the flashing appeared mostly random but sometimes sequential. this object was perpendicular to a 3-star formation at the same altitude (from my perspective). i continued to look and then came in house and told my wife about the object but she did not want to get up from her sleep. i went back out with my binoculars and this time i spotted a second star-like object, equidistant from the 3-star group as the first unusual light i saw. this light also had lights flashing around a white center; also red, blue and a greenish color. if anything, these lights were even brighter. i roused my wife who grudgingly came out to observe what i told her i saw. she described what she saw and it matched my description of what i saw. after observing the lights a few minutes more, i came in the house and looked up the mufon-nc website and joined. then i saw the clips from cnn at your website about ufo's and in particular the sightings in missouri of orbs that pulsated light which the local mufon person at first thought was the star vega, but later regarded as ufo's when more than one appeared. the description of the lights and their colors were the same as what i observed. at this point i decided to report what i had seen earlier. a little while ago i went out (after 3 a.M.) and observed that the object were still there in the sky and still equidistant from the 3-star formation, but they did not appear to be flashing lights like before. i don't know if what i saw was merely atmospheric refraction and perhaps refraction through my binocular lenses or not. i will say that the night sky was cloudless and there was no moisture in the air--the air was dry for a change. i felt puzzled when i looked at the objects. they didn't move at all so i know they weren't airplanes or helicopters. they were too high to be cell tower beacons, and were over water in any case. maybe they were just stars but i have never seen stars that flashed multi-colored lights. i would really like to know if others observed what i saw, and whether what i saw were merely stars blinking or something else altogether. i won't be terribly surprised either way but would really like some kind of feedback if possible.
content.summary: Two starlike lights in sky equidistant from 3 in-line vertical stars and flashing blue green and red lights ffrom a white center

content.detailedDescription: I was on the porch with my cousin smoking a cigg we were talking and i looked up and i seen a light the light moved very slow then it like looked like light were turned on from one end to the other but went out as they past then it vanished and i dont even know a word for how fast i wanted to tell my cousin but come on how is it gonna sound then it appeared again about i guess 30 miles miles it was a full head spin from one side to the other im not good with distances and then i told him and he thinks im crazy. i let it go and then i went on facebook and one of my friends posted something and he said he didnt wanna sound crazy and one of his friends commented that they seen it too i dk if they wanna make it known but i never thought i would see what i seen today i even tried to come up with an explanation to myself cause i cant believe i seen that i always thought it would be cool but it actually has me up still at 3:03am thinking about it looking online if anyone else seen it....(i am not crazy i know what i seen) im glad theres a site to let other people know you have more resources then i do you can find out if other people seen it too i line in bayonne new jersey and from where i was sitting on the porch if i was looking directly down towards the bayonne bridge it was off to the far left really far out and it was still pretty big like i said i dont know distance but it was far and big then after it did that light circle thing it did it just completely disappeared and then i looked all the way right and i seen it again then it was just gone. thank you im putting 3 witnesses under but im not sure if they seen what i seen.
content.summary: It looked circular a light flashed around it it vanished re-appeared about 30 miles south

content.detailedDescription: Between 9:45 and 10:00 pm on thursday sept 20th .. my uncle and i were driving my daughter to nebraska city, we were driving south east on nebraska hwy 2 a few miles out side of palmyra ne. i noticed a very bright light in the sky i said look how bright it is.. we came around a curve and i realized it was not moving but hovering i couldnt tell how high but i as we passed my daughter and i both saw 3 lights underneith it 1 light in front on the bottem 2 on each side on the bottom.. it looked like the shape of a triangle or diamond shape..I tried to get my uncle to pull over so i could take a picture of it but he said its just an airplane...I said an airplane does not set in one place hovering over a field in the dark!...I noticed the next landmark i could find near it was hwy2 and hwy43 intersection ..After we dropped my daughteer off in nebr city on the way back i looked for it and it was no longer there...I know it was not a plane or helicopter.. i have no idea what it could have been...I also looked for towers the only towers around had red flashing lights but none were near these lights....When we drove back after thinking about it my uncle said he would slow down to see it again but as i said it was gone...  he said if it was a real ufo why wernt there other people stopped takeing pictures...I said because most people are like you .. they see it and keep going thinking theres a logical explanation.... but this was very odd looking....
content.summary: Object hovering  in the sky with very bright lights....

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were on the highway headed southbound on the way home from work. he first saw a flash in the sky which we immediately dismissed as a shooting star. i noticed he kept looking up in the sky and finally he pointed out to me something that looked star-like only it was fading and reappearing over and over, we kept our eye on it and for a moment it didn't reappear in the same spot, we began searching the sky for it once we ruled out that it was not a star, i spotted it over to the right of the highway only this time it was much brighter as it continued to do as it was before, fading and reappearing about the same speed as a lighthouse would. once again it disappeared during one of the times it faded so we searched the sky and it was back to where we originally spotted it only this time it was not pulsating it was hovering for a few moments until it moved steadily left, until it was directly over the highway in front of us, it became brighter than anything else in the sky, descending briskly a significant distance and vanished. during this time my boyfriend and i tried our best to find a reasonable explanation for what we were seeing it was until we saw it move left and then descend that we were absolutely certain and got rid of our denial that what we were truly seeing was a ufo. at the time this was happening and i knew undoubtedly what i was seeing i got a chill that ran from my head to my toes, my eyes began watering and a storm of shock swam over me, i looked at my boyfriend who was also in shock and told him we have seen a ufo and who on earth is going to believe us. we arrived home and sat outside for about an hour staring into the sky hoping to see it again but had no luck.
content.summary: Pulsating light disappeared then reappeared over to the right, pulsated much brighter, then disappeared, then reappeared to the right, moved left until straight ahead, hovered, became very bright, descended and then disappeared again.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach. i saw a bright light in the sky that i thought was a small plane  next thing, i thought it crashed into the ocean near the surf.  as i got closer i realized it was not a plane and did not crash. i was relieved it was not a crashed plane but  i was anxious.  i saw a bright light just over the water. next i saw a round, metallic object ascend from beneath the ocean and hover over it. the water swirled around it when it rose out above the water.   there was a bright light beam underneath what looked like a craft.  i had my iphone and took pictures. i don't even recall the craft leaving. i remember it was completely silent i didn't look at the pictures until months later  i don't know why i waited so long. i don't really remember taking pictures which is why i haven't reported this until now. i figure an expert can explain the pictures because i cannot. this has bothered me since. i've had several nightmares of a ufo hovering over me and sending a beam of light after me. i wake up frightened. i feel scared writing this now.
content.summary: I thought i saw a small plane crashing into ocean just off the beach

content.detailedDescription: I was walking on the beach. i saw a bright light in the sky that i thought was a small plane  next thing, i thought it crashed into the ocean near the surf.  as i got closer i realized it was not a plane and did not crash. i was relieved it was not a crashed plane but  i was anxious.  i saw a bright light just over the water. next i saw a round, metallic object ascend from beneath the ocean and hover over it. the water swirled around it when it rose out above the water.   there was a bright light beam underneath what looked like a craft.  i had my iphone and took pictures. i don't even recall the craft leaving. i remember it was completely silent i didn't look at the pictures until months later  i don't know why i waited so long. i don't really remember taking pictures which is why i haven't reported this until now. i figure an expert can explain the pictures because i cannot. this has bothered me since. i've had several nightmares of a ufo hovering over me and sending a beam of light after me. i wake up frightened. i feel scared writing this now.
content.summary: I thought i saw a small plane crashing into ocean just off the beach

content.detailedDescription:
Saw a light that was red in the sky
than i took my ipod out and began to record the redoubt was not visible whe recording but i recorded any way while i was recording the red light would shape shift and dissapearing and reappear i was looking army ipod to see if i was catching anything but i saw nothing when i played the video i caught something better that i was unable to see while recording i recorded a white light moving and turning fast and dissapearing and reapearing the video was taking while i was on the highway and. my wife driving. i was exited to see it because i think i have witnessed them befor and this time i had a camera
content.summary: Sash usual lights filmed nothing showed while shooting but something showed up while observing the video
